page.title: 20COMPILORS FROM DEFYNNOG
page.content: {(Aged 9 - 10) D Elizabeth Davies {E} Sarah Harris Simon Jones {F} Martin Stephens Conrad {Y} Roberts{ {(Aged 8-9) N Marie Casey {N }Merrissa Fallas Hazel Jones {O} Sarah Mellors Julie Davies{ G }Sarah Davies Clare Jones Huw Evans Alan Davies{ C }Robert Goddard Rhys Thomas{ P }Rhys Thomas {(Aged 7-8) } Ceri David {S }Samantha Williams Dawn Waghorn{ C }Delyth Prosser Bethan Lewis{ H }Thomas Watkins Richard Jenkins{ O }Andrew Robinson Matthew Evans{ O }James Davies {L Many thanks to Defynnog & Sennybridge Post Offices for their help as collection points for questionaires. (Class teacher R.Downing)
